item.title: 瑞银财富和邓普顿认为中国股市将面临关税打击
item.description: 一些全球最大的基金经理表示，中国股市有能力抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国经济发动的关税闪电战。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest money managers say Chinese stocks have the means to weather the tariff blitz unleashed by US President Donald Trump on the economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称美国关税不妨碍四月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）告诉彭博新闻社，美国政府宣布的关税预计将 "对欧元区第一年的国内生产总值增长率产生负面影响，初步估计约为 0.3% 至 0.4%"。【原文：The tariffs announced by the US administration are expected to “negatively influence the euro-area’s GDP growth rate with a first estimate of the order of 0.3% to 0.4% in the first year,” European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras tells Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 特朗普的互惠关税对印度意味着什么？
item.description: "关税之王"关税的 "滥用大户"。一个 "非常高关税的国家"。美国总统唐纳德-特朗普多年来多次明确表示他对印度贸易保护主义政策的看法。【原文：“Tariff king.” A “big abuser” of tariffs. A “very high tariff nation.” US President Donald Trump has repeatedly made it clear over the years what he thinks of India’s protectionist trade policies.】

item.title: 土耳其 3 月年通胀率降至 38.1%
item.description: 土耳其 3 月份的年度通胀率放缓幅度超过预期，尽管该数据未计入近期因一名主要反对派政治家被拘留而引发的政治和市场动荡所造成的任何影响。【原文：Turkey’s annual inflation slowed more than expected in March, though the data excludes any impact from recent political and market turmoil stemming from the detention of a leading opposition politician.】

item.title: 白宫附件显示部分国家关税水平略有变化
item.description: 十多个将被美国征收互惠关税的国家可能会面临比最初预期略高的征税。【原文：More than a dozen countries set for US reciprocal tariffs may face slightly higher levies than they first expected.】

item.title: 葡萄牙总理联盟在民意调查中领先，RTP 报道
item.description: 据 RTP 网站报道，葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山领导的葡萄牙民主联盟在民意调查中以 2 个百分点的优势领先于反对党社会党。【原文：Portuguese Prime Minister Luis Montenegro’s AD coalition led the opposition Socialists by a margin of 2 percentage points in an opinion poll, RTP reported on its website.】

item.title: 纳格尔称美国关税将考验欧洲央行的政策进展
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一系列关税措施威胁着全球经济，也让人质疑欧洲中央银行在对抗通胀方面所取得的成就。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s array of tariffs threatens the global economy and calls into question the European Central Bank’s achievements in fighting inflation, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 南非称美国关税证实双边贸易协议的必要性
item.description: 南非总统府表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布的贸易关税措施表明，与美国谈判一项新的双边互利贸易协定迫在眉睫。【原文：Trade tariffs announced by President Donald Trump affirm the urgency to negotiate a new bilateral and mutually beneficial trade agreement with the US, South Africa’s Presidency said.】

item.title: 亚洲货币和股市在关税影响下领跌新兴市场国家
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的对等贸易关税对该地区造成了巨大影响，亚洲货币和股票领跌新兴市场。【原文：Asian currencies and stocks led emerging-market declines as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal trade tariffs disproportionately impact the region.】

item.title: 瑞士 3 月通胀率意外维持在四年低位
item.description: 瑞士通胀率出人意料地维持在四年来的最低水平，这表明瑞士通胀压力疲软，导致瑞士央行上个月将利率下调至接近零的水平。【原文：Swiss inflation unexpectedly held at a four-year low, evidence for weak pressures that led the central bank to cut interest rates closer to zero last month.】

item.title: 美国成为特朗普关税的最大市场输家
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对全球贸易体系的撼动对美国资产造成的伤害超过了他刚刚加征额外关税的许多大型经济体的资产。【原文：Donald Trump’s shake-up of the global trading system is hurting US assets more than those in many of the big economies he has just slapped with additional tariffs.】

item.title: 军火亿万富翁的捷克斯洛伐克集团去年利润增长两倍
item.description: 捷克斯洛伐克集团公司（Czechoslovak Group AS）是欧洲最大的防务公司之一，该公司表示，由于加大了对乌克兰和北约国家的装备供应，其去年的利润增长了两倍。【原文：Czechoslovak Group AS, one of the biggest defense companies in Europe, said its profit tripled last year as it ramped up supplies of equipment to Ukraine and NATO countries.】

item.title: 关税冲击市场，印度制药、韩国国防股表现亮眼
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）新开征的关税给亚洲股市带来了一些意想不到的赢家，尽管整个地区的股市都在下跌。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s fresh tariffs brought some unexpected stock winners to the fore in Asia, even as equity markets tumbled across the region.】

item.title: 南非联盟岌岌可危，预算案显示裂痕不断扩大
item.description: 南非的执政联盟面临解体的风险，因为其主要成员之间关于增税提案的争论加深，使兰特遭受重创。【原文：South Africa’s ruling coalition risks unraveling after a dispute between its main members over proposed tax increases deepened, pummeling the rand.】

item.title: 挪威三文鱼和螃蟹在新关税出台前对美出口激增
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收百年来最严厉的美国关税之前，挪威对美国的海产品出口在第一季度猛增了56%。【原文：Norway’s seafood exports to the US surged 56% in the first quarter in advance of President Donald Trump imposing the steepest American tariffs in a century.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在全球关税驱动的大跌中下跌
印度资产表现优于亚洲，关税打击被视为温和
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施被认为对印度经济增长和企业利润的影响较小，因此印度资产周四受到的冲击小于亚洲同行。【原文：Indian assets suffered less than their Asian peers Thursday after President Donald Trump’s tariff measures were perceived as less severe on the nation’s economic growth and corporate profits.】

item.title: 美国关税对中国的冲击远甚于第一次贸易战
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新的关税上调措施有可能对中国经济造成比其第一次贸易战期间更大的打击。【原文：Donald Trump’s latest tariff hikes threaten to inflict a bigger hit on China’s economy than it suffered during his first trade war.】

item.title: 美国加征关税导致亚洲出口商与越南工厂股价下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对东南亚国家越南征收高于预期的关税后，在越南生产商品的亚洲公司股价下滑。【原文：Shares of Asian companies that manufacture goods in Vietnam slid after US President Donald Trump slapped higher-than-expected tariffs on the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: AirTrunk 寻求 17 亿美元贷款以建设新加坡数据中心
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blackstone 旗下的数据中心公司 AirTrunk 正在为新加坡的一个新绿地项目寻求 22 亿新元（17 亿美元）的绿色贷款，因为该公司正寻求加强其区域扩张计划。【原文：Blackstone-owned data center firm AirTrunk is seeking a S$2.2 billion ($1.7 billion) green loan for a new greenfield project in Singapore, according to people familiar with the matter, as it looks to ramp up its expansion plans regionally.】

item.title: 美联社称美国禁止驻华工作人员与中国公民谈恋爱
item.description: 美联社援引知情人士的话报道称，美国已禁止驻华政府人员与中国公民发生恋爱或性关系。【原文：The US has banned government personnel based in China from having romantic or sexual relationships with Chinese citizens, the Associated Press reported citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 盈利预测未达预期，中东上市企业倍感压力
item.description: 中东地区的公司在首次公开募股中大获全胜，但却未能实现其崇高的盈利目标，这些公司正开始为此付出代价。【原文：Middle Eastern firms that rode the region’s boom in initial public offerings to only fall short of their lofty earnings targets are beginning to pay the price.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行就澳大利亚养老基金的海外和私人资产发出警告
item.description: 澳大利亚央行警告说，养老基金对外国资产和私人资产的需求激增，有可能给该国的金融体系带来风险。【原文：Australia’s central bank warned that pension funds’ surging appetite for foreign and private assets potentially poses a risk to the country’s financial system.】

item.title: 投资银行家称不确定性影响南非交易
item.description: 据南非一位顶级投资银行家称，南非政府内部的分裂以及全球宏观经济的不确定性正在拖累这个非洲大陆最大经济体的交易活动。【原文：Fractures within the South African government — along with global macroeconomic uncertainty — are weighing on dealmaking activity in the continent’s largest economy, according to one of the country’s top investment bankers.】

item.title: 美元短缺威胁莫桑比克的面包和燃料供应
item.description: 莫桑比克的外汇短缺已经影响到燃料供应，并有可能造成面包短缺。【原文：A foreign-exchange shortfall in Mozambique is already hitting fuel supplies and risks causing a scarcity of bread as well.】

item.title: 你不是认真的吧！
item.description:
但是，任何明眼的裁判都会认为特朗普的关税政策过了界。【原文：

But any clear-eyed umpire would have to judge Trump’s tariffs as over the line.

】

item.title: 特朗普的 "互惠 "关税方案只关乎贸易赤字
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府主要根据现有的贸易平衡来计算一系列新的关税；这背离了与其他国家的关税税率和其他贸易壁垒相匹配的承诺。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration calculated its raft of new tariffs primarily based on existing trade balances — a departure from pledges to match the tariff rates and other trade barriers from other countries.】

item.title: 比亚迪将把韩国销售网络扩大一倍，向现代汽车发起挑战
item.description: 比亚迪公司计划增加其在韩国的销售网络，因为韩国的汽车市场主要由本土品牌现代汽车公司和起亚公司主导，比亚迪公司正努力在其中国大本营以外的地区增加交付量。【原文：BYD Co. plans to increase its sales network in South Korea, a car market dominated by local brands Hyundai Motor Co. and Kia Corp., as it pushes for more deliveries outside of its home stronghold of China.】

item.title: 特斯拉的电动车霸主地位是否已成为历史？
item.description:
BYD 的电池突破是 "DeepSeek 时刻"，Craig Trudell 在本周的Zero节目中说道。【原文：

BYD’s battery breakthrough is a “DeepSeek moment,” says Craig Trudell on this week’s episode of Zero.

】

item.title: 引领私人市场繁荣
item.description:
【原文：

On this week’s episode of In the City, we discuss the renewed momentum behind the private credit market and what’s driving it. 

】
